# PHP/CheckWrite

Check whether writing to stdout works.

## Cache variables

* `PHP_WRITE_STDOUT`

  Whether `write(2)` works.

## Usage

```cmake
# CMakeLists.txt
include(PHP/CheckWrite)
```
